review_title: Save Yourself, No One Has Your Back
job_title: Area Coordinator in Mount Pleasant, IA
pros: It's so disorganized that no one knows what's going on, so essentially you can do your job with minimal hand-holding but expect no one to understand and pile on additional tasks that are not really your area concern.
cons: Admins are beyond incompetent. Promoting those with minimal experience and questionable morals. Students suffer because of the poor leadership and inability to keep people who actually care about them. Admins also don't understand the struggles of the minority experience and the students do not trust anyone in a position of power as a result. If you are in residence life, watch out. Your compensation will not be worth what they ask of you, put yourself first and push back. They're desperate right now, milk it.

pros: This has been the best experience. The people are caring and it very nice environment to work in.
cons: There are not a lot of cons to working at IW.
